ctx: induction ln as [| x ln' IHln].
destruct (nth x lt ([], [])) as [th tl] eqn:Hnth.
destruct (tile_concat ln' lt) as [hh ll] eqn:Htc.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "(hh, ll)" in the current goal.

ctx: induction ln as [| x ln' IHln].
destruct (nth x lt ([], [])) as [th tl] eqn:Hnth.
destruct (tile_concat ln' lt) as [hh ll] eqn:Htc.
exceptions.exn: In environment x : nat ln' : list nat lt : list (list bool * list bool) Htc : tile_concat ln' lt = (itau1 lt (rev ln'), itau2 lt (rev ln')) th, tl : list bool Hnth : nth x lt ([], []) = (th, tl) Unable to unify "(itau1 lt (rev ln' ++ [x]), itau2 lt (rev ln' ++ [x]))" with "(itau1 lt (rev ln') ++ th, itau2 lt (rev ln') ++ tl)".

original: induction ln as [| x ln' IHln]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (nth x lt ([], [])) as [th tl] eqn:Hnth. destruct (tile_concat ln' lt) as [hh ll] eqn:Htc. rewrite IHln, Hnth, Htc. reflexivity.
